Posts.Content: Hi there, my name is Patty and I have been having Zometa for the last 6 years. Sometimes I feel alittle low the next day however, normally I don't have any side effects. I used to have it every month, now I get it every 3 months. I sure hope the next time you have it you will feel better. It truly is a wonderful bone strengthener. I call it my bone juice. Take care~ No fun having cancer thats for sure. Sincerely, Patty
Posts.Title: Zometa round 1, laid me low

Posts.Content: Dear Grace, I hear that....well, advil p.m. works great!! And for the sweats... a low dose of effexor gals works well too!! Anxiety, ativan....I don't know what I would do without my meds. They truly get me to the normal kind of level. Love, Cure
